org.xmappr.converters

接口 ElementConverter

  • 所有超级接口:
    Converter
    所有已知实现类:
    ClassConverter, CollectionConverter, DomElementConverter, ValueConverterWrapper

    public interface ElementConverter
extends Converter
    Classes implementing ElementConverter interface are used for serializing/deserializing xml nodes to Java objects. They are responsible for reading/writing the xml stream on their own. They must always read/write the full xml node including all subnodes.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Object fromElement(XMLSimpleReader reader, MappingContext mappingContext, String defaultValue, String format, Class targetType, Object targetObject)
      Method responsible for reading a complete xml node from XMLSimpleReader and returning deserialized Object that corresponds to this node.
      void toElement(Object object, QName nodeName, XMLSimpleWriter writer, MappingContext mappingContext, String defaultValue, String format)
      Takes an Object and serializes it to a XML element and writes it out to XmlSimpleWriter.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.xmappr.converters.Converter

        canConvert

    • 方法详细资料

      • fromElement

        Object fromElement(XMLSimpleReader reader,
                   MappingContext mappingContext,
                   String defaultValue,
                   String format,
                   Class targetType,
                   Object targetObject)
        Method responsible for reading a complete xml node from XMLSimpleReader and returning deserialized Object that corresponds to this node. When XMLSimpleReader instance is passed to this method it is already positioned on the xml node that is to be converted. Method can inspect all node's attributes, value and subnodes. When method returns, the reader MUST be positioned on the end of the same node as it was when entering method.
        参数:
        reader - XMLSimpleReader to read XML data from.
        mappingContext -
        defaultValue - Default value to use if xml element is empty.
        format - Format string passed in from @XMLelement(format="..."). Used to set conversion options.
        targetType -
        targetObject -
        返回:
        Deserialized object.

      • toElement

        void toElement(Object object,
               QName nodeName,
               XMLSimpleWriter writer,
               MappingContext mappingContext,
               String defaultValue,
               String format)
        Takes an Object and serializes it to a XML element and writes it out to XmlSimpleWriter. Method must write out the whole XML element including closing tag.
        参数:
        object - Object to be serialized. If it is null then no element must be written.
        nodeName - The name of the XML element.
        writer - XmlSimpleWriter to write data to.
        mappingContext -
        defaultValue - If serialized object equals default value (for simple elements), then an empty element
        format - Format string passed in from @XMLelement(format="..."). Used to set conversion options.
